author: CoWork-OSS

skills.name: Test Plan Generator
skills.description: Generate a comprehensive test plan for a feature or release
skills.prompt:
Create a test plan for the following feature.

Feature:
{{feature}}

Please include:
1. Test scope and objectives
2. Test cases (functional, edge cases, negative)
3. Integration test scenarios
4. Performance test criteria
5. Accessibility checks
6. Environment requirements
7. Risk areas requiring extra coverage
8. Estimated effort

parameters.name: feature
parameters.description: Feature or change to create a test plan for

skills.name: Bug Report
skills.description: Create a well-structured bug report from reproduction details
skills.prompt:
Create a structured bug report.

Issue details:
{{details}}

Format:
1. Title (concise, descriptive)
2. Severity (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
3. Environment (OS, browser, version)
4. Steps to reproduce
5. Expected behavior
6. Actual behavior
7. Screenshots/logs (note what to capture)
8. Possible root cause
9. Workaround (if any)

skills.name: Release Readiness Checklist
skills.description: Assess release readiness with a structured quality checklist
skills.prompt:
Assess release readiness.

Release info:
{{release_info}}

Provide:
1. Test pass rate and trends
2. Open bugs by severity
3. Untested or partially tested areas
4. Regression test results
5. Performance benchmark comparison
6. Known issues and workarounds
7. Go/No-Go recommendation with reasoning
8. Post-release monitoring plan

parameters.name: release_info
parameters.description: Release details, test results, bug counts

agentRoles.name: qa-assistant
agentRoles.description: Assists QA engineers with test planning, bug reporting, and release quality assessment
agentRoles.systemPrompt: You are a QA Assistant. You help QA engineers create test plans, write bug reports, analyze test coverage, and assess release readiness. You are thorough, methodical, and always reference specific test evidence.
